description: Semantic code search built for AI agents. Hybrid, AST-aware, context for 166 languages.

cmd.description: Automatically remove container when it exits
cmd.name: --rm

workspace.description: Path to your codebase to index and search

host_port.description: Host port to expose MCP server

network.description: Docker network name (use 'host' for local Qdrant or custom network)

name: com.knitli/codeweaver

environmentVariables.description: Specify a custom config file path for CodeWeaver. Only needed if not using the default locations.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_CONFIG_FILE

environmentVariables.description: Enable debug mode for CodeWeaver.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_DEBUG

environmentVariables.description: Specify the API key for the embedding provider, if required. Note: {', '.join([p for p in _providers_for_kind('embedding') if p.])}
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_EMBEDDING_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Specify the embedding model to use.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_EMBEDDING_MODEL

environmentVariables.description: Specify the embedding provider to use.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_EMBEDDING_PROVIDER

environmentVariables.description: Set the server host for CodeWeaver.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_HOST

environmentVariables.description: Set the log level for CodeWeaver (e.g., DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR).
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_LOG_LEVEL

environmentVariables.description: Set the MCP server port for CodeWeaver if using http transport for mcp. Not required if using the default port (9328), or stdio transport.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_MCP_PORT

environmentVariables.description: Set the port for the codeweaver management server (information and management endpoints).
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_PORT

environmentVariables.description: Use a premade provider settings profile for CodeWeaver.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_PROFILE

environmentVariables.description: Set the project name for CodeWeaver.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_PROJECT_NAME

environmentVariables.description: Set the project path for CodeWeaver.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_PROJECT_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Specify the API key for the reranking provider, if required.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_RERANKING_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Specify the reranking model to use.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_RERANKING_MODEL

environmentVariables.description: Specify the reranking provider to use.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_RERANKING_PROVIDER

environmentVariables.description: Specify the sparse embedding model to use.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_SPARSE_EMBEDDING_MODEL

environmentVariables.description: Specify the sparse embedding provider to use.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_SPARSE_EMBEDDING_PROVIDER

environmentVariables.description: Specify the API key for the vector store, if required.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Specify the port for the vector store.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_PORT

environmentVariables.description: Specify the vector store provider to use.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_PROVIDER

environmentVariables.description: Specify the URL for the vector store.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_URL

environmentVariables.description: Disable telemetry data collection.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER__TELEMETRY__DISABLE_TELEMETRY

environmentVariables.description: Opt-in to potentially identifying collection of query and search result data. This is invaluable for helping us improve CodeWeaver's search capabilities. If privacy is a higher priority, do not enable this setting.
environmentVariables.name: CODEWEAVER__TELEMETRY__TOOLS_OVER_PRIVACY

environmentVariables.description: HTTP proxy for requests (Used by: Azure, Azure, Voyage)
environmentVariables.name: HTTPS_PROXY

environmentVariables.description: API key for OpenAI-compatible services (not necessarily an API key *for* OpenAI). The OpenAI client also requires an API key, even if you don't actually need one for your provider (like local Ollama). So provide a dummy key if needed. (Used by: Azure, Cerebras, Deepseek, Fireworks, Github, Groq, Heroku, Moonshot, Ollama, Openai, Openrouter, Perplexity, Together, Vercel, X Ai)
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: One of: 'debug', 'info', 'warning', 'error' (Used by: Azure, Cerebras, Deepseek, Fireworks, Github, Groq, Heroku, Moonshot, Ollama, Openai, Openrouter, Perplexity, Together, Vercel, X Ai)
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_LOG

environmentVariables.description: Path to the SSL certificate file for requests (Used by: Azure, Azure, Voyage)
environmentVariables.name: SSL_CERT_FILE

environmentVariables.description: API key for Vercel service
environmentVariables.name: AI_GATEWAY_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: AWS Account ID for Bedrock service
environmentVariables.name: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID

environmentVariables.description: AWS region for Bedrock service
environmentVariables.name: AWS_REGION

environmentVariables.description: AWS Secret Access Key for Bedrock service
environmentVariables.name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY

environmentVariables.description: API key for Azure Cohere service (cohere models on Azure)
environmentVariables.name: AZURE_COHERE_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Endpoint for Azure Cohere service (cohere models on Azure)
environmentVariables.name: AZURE_COHERE_ENDPOINT

environmentVariables.description: Region for Azure Cohere service
environmentVariables.name: AZURE_COHERE_REGION

environmentVariables.description: API key for Azure OpenAI service (OpenAI models on Azure)
environmentVariables.name: AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Endpoint for Azure OpenAI service (OpenAI models on Azure)
environmentVariables.name: AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT

environmentVariables.description: Region for Azure OpenAI service (OpenAI models on Azure)
environmentVariables.name: AZURE_OPENAI_REGION

environmentVariables.description: Your Cohere API Key
environmentVariables.name: COHERE_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Host URL for Cohere service
environmentVariables.name: CO_API_URL

environmentVariables.description: API key for DeepSeek service
environmentVariables.name: DEEPSEEK_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Your Google Gemini API Key
environmentVariables.name: GEMINI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Your Google API Key
environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Log level for Hugging Face Hub client
environmentVariables.name: HF_HUB_VERBOSITY

environmentVariables.description: API key/token for Hugging Face service
environmentVariables.name: HF_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: HTTP proxy for requests
environmentVariables.name: HTTPS_PROXY

environmentVariables.description: API key for Heroku service
environmentVariables.name: INFERENCE_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Host URL for Heroku service
environmentVariables.name: INFERENCE_URL

environmentVariables.description: Your Mistral API Key
environmentVariables.name: MISTRAL_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: API key for OpenAI-compatible services (not necessarily an API key *for* OpenAI). The OpenAI client also requires an API key, even if you don't actually need one for your provider (like local Ollama). So provide a dummy key if needed.
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: One of: 'debug', 'info', 'warning', 'error'
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_LOG

environmentVariables.description: Log level for Qdrant service
environmentVariables.name: QDRANT__LOG_LEVEL

environmentVariables.description: API key for Qdrant service
environmentVariables.name: QDRANT__SERVICE__API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Enable TLS for Qdrant service, expects truthy or false value (e.g. 1 for on, 0 for off).
environmentVariables.name: QDRANT__SERVICE__ENABLE_TLS

environmentVariables.description: Hostname of the Qdrant service; do not use for URLs with schemes (e.g. 'http://')
environmentVariables.name: QDRANT__SERVICE__HOST

environmentVariables.description: Port number for the Qdrant service
environmentVariables.name: QDRANT__SERVICE__HTTP_PORT

environmentVariables.description: Path to the TLS certificate file for Qdrant service. Only needed if using a self-signed certificate. If you're using qdrant-cloud, you don't need this.
environmentVariables.name: QDRANT__TLS__CERT

environmentVariables.description: Path to the SSL certificate file for requests
environmentVariables.name: SSL_CERT_FILE

environmentVariables.description: Your Tavily API Key
environmentVariables.name: TAVILY_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: API key for Together service
environmentVariables.name: TOGETHER_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: OIDC token for Vercel service
environmentVariables.name: VERCEL_OIDC_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: API key for Voyage service
environmentVariables.name: VOYAGE_API_KEY

packageArguments.description: Bind to all interfaces in container
packageArguments.name: --host

packageArguments.description: Use streamable-http for persistent state and continuous indexing
packageArguments.name: --transport

runtimeArguments.description: Automatically remove container when it exits
runtimeArguments.name: --rm

workspace.description: Path to your codebase to index and search

host_port.description: Host port to expose MCP server

network.description: Docker network name (use 'host' for local Qdrant or custom network)
